### 4) PERMIT TIMING (DURATIONS)

### 5) VALUE-ADD SUMMARY
The property at 7841 Stewart Ave was purchased with an original configuration of 4 beds and 3 baths, spanning 1,965 SF. It has since been significantly remodeled, increasing the living space to 2,890 SF with an additional bed and bath. However, due to a lack of available financial data and permits, the exact value added, its duration, and any financial spread cannot be determined definitively.
